output_list.description: The mint function in the SPXToken contract does not check if the total supply of tokens will exceed the token limit. This could lead to an integer overflow if the total supply exceeds the token limit.

The convertPresaleTokens function in the SpadeIco contract does not check if the total number of tokens sold will exceed the token limit. This could lead to an integer overflow if the total number of tokens sold exceeds the token limit.

The creditJackpotTokens function in the SpadeIco contract does not check if the total number of tokens sold will exceed the token limit. This could lead to an integer overflow if the total number of tokens sold exceeds the token limit.

The buyTokens function in the SpadeIco contract does not check if the total number of tokens sold will exceed the token limit. This could lead to an integer overflow if the total number of tokens sold exceeds the token limit.

The mint function in the SPXToken contract is only accessible by the ICO agent. However, it does not check if the caller is the ICO agent. This could allow anyone to mint tokens without the ICO agent's permission.
